tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE shipments (
  shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  medication_name VARCHAR(50),
  manufacturer_name VARCHAR(50),
  distributor_name VARCHAR(50),
  shipment_date DATE,
  quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE distributors (
    distributor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (manufacturer_id) REFERENCES manufacturers(manufacturer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Manufacturer (
	manufacturer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	manufacturer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	manufacturer_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Medication (
	medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	medication_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	medication_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Distributor (
	distributor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	distributor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	distributor_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Manufacturer (
   manufacturer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE medications (
	medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	medication_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	medication_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	manufacturer_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (manufacturer_id) REFERENCES manufacturers(manufacturer_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE shipments (
	shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	shipment_date DATE NOT NULL,
	medication_id INT,
	distributor_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES medications(medication_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
	FOREIGN KEY (distributor_id) REFERENCES distributors(distributor_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE tracking (
	tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	shipment_id INT,
	location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (shipment_id) REFERENCES shipments(shipment_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
